title: Letter to the American Church
description: In an earnest and searing wake-up call, the author of the bestseller  Pastor, Martyr, Prophet, Spy warns of the haunting similarities between today’s American church and the German church of the 1930s. Echoing Bonhoeffer’s prophetic call, Eric Metaxas exhorts his fellow Christians to repent of their silence in the face of evil before it is too late.
author: Eric Metaxas
